content: I think I'll keep it open-ended for now and see how it develops. I just want to start writing down my thoughts and opinions about the films I watch and see where it takes me. I might add some ratings or reviews, but I don't want to feel obligated to write a full-fledged review for every single film. I just want to have a space to reflect on what I've watched and maybe discover some patterns or themes in my viewing habits.
